imdb.plot outline: La Sangre Tira. Ten chapters recorded in Chile and abroad make a documentary series where Chileans seek its origins. Each of the ten chapters has a (a) protagonist who decides to seek the roots of their history abroad unraveling of his family tree. The challenge will lead them to take a physical and inner journey, motivated by the will to know the history of his own family, and questions and conflicts that represents an identity from a cultural and blood mixture.
imdb.title: La Sangre Tira
plot: _La Sangre Tira_ (qv). Ten chapters recorded in Chile and abroad make a documentary series where Chileans seek its origins. Each of the ten chapters has a (a) protagonist who decides to seek the roots of their history abroad unraveling of his family tree. The challenge will lead them to take a physical and inner journey, motivated by the will to know the history of his own family, and questions and conflicts that represents an identity from a cultural and blood mixture.::Surreal Películas de la realidad [cl]
